body:
We can do better than show you the **Texas Polls**.

We're going to show you the exact **Presidential Election Betting for Texas.** 

Want to know who will win the great state?

Using **[The Wisdom of Crowds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wisdom_of_Crowds)** on Betfair, we've got up to the second data.

- - -

## **Texas Trump vs Biden**

The Texas Polls have Biden and Trump nearly neck and neck. The betting data, with more outputs, says Texas should still be Trump.

<canvas id='g12' name="brgraph" data-file-name="TexasOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats" data-start="2020-03-04 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

- - -

## **Texas Polls**

Texas is the perfect state to apply caution with poll data. 

If you check out FiveThirtyEight's polls for **[Texas](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/texas/)** you'll see that Biden is right behind Donald Trump.

Where the betting odds information excels is taking poll data with a grain of salt.

Texas has voted Republican in every election since 1980.

Just because Austin is attracting Silicon Valley types in 2020, doesn't mean the proud state is nearly blue.

At this stage, Trump should still be winning Texas:

![texas polls and texas trump](/images/uploads/trump-polls-and-texas-trump.jpg "texas polls and texas trump")

- - -

## **More US Election Odds**

We're determined to give you the most accurate prediction data in the world. Simply by reflecting betting data.

Make sure you check out:

* **[Election Betting Odds 2020: Trump vs Biden](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/election-betting-odds)**
* **[Biden VP Odds](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/biden-vp-odds)**

With many more exclusive pages to come.
title: Texas Polls & Presidential Election Betting
